description: [New Times] The negative coverage of African affairs, especially by the Western media entities, is depriving the continent's economies of an estimated US$4.2 billion annually, according to a study launched Thursday, October 10, Xinhua reports.
title: Africa: Biased Western Media Eroding Investors' Confidence, Stunting Africa's Growth - Study

description: [This Day] Abuja -- The International Criminal Police Organisation (Interpol), has said that the Nigeria Police Force National Cybercrime Centre (NPF-NCCC), is setting the pace in the fight against cybercrime in Africa.
title: Africa: Nigeria Is Pacesetter in Fight Against Cybercrime in Africa, Says Interpol

description: [The Conversation Africa] Communities across the world are facing two worsening crises: a climate crisis and a care crisis.
title: Africa: Climate Change - Care for Humans, Other Species and the Natural Environment Is the Key to a Just Transition
